strengths.title: Triggers Energy Blackhole upon Ultimate Evasion
strengths.text-gw: Makes AOE more effective and avoids being surrounded by enemies.

strengths.title: Shield breaker
strengths.text-gw: Up to 60% increase to shield damage plus stun upon successful shield break.

strengths.title: Excellent support that provide more than just HP recovery
strengths.text-gw: Provides large damage through black hole and shield break, access to bleeding and stun status effects. Giving her Water Spirit Type-II or Mjolnir allows her to inflict status effects on enemies being affected by black hole and combos well with other valkyries.

strengths.title: Can deal damage from a distance
strengths.text-gw: VR Kiana's basic attack is ranged, so it is possible to damage enemies from far. Even if distance is created due to evasion, damage can still be dealt to enemies.

weaknesses.title: Lack of switch skill
weaknesses.text-gw: Not always bad since no time is lost when switching her in.

weaknesses.title: Low damage
weaknesses.text-gw: VR Kiana is mainly a support.

skills.skill-desc: Increases whole team's Movement Speed by 25% and Mecha Characters' Attack Speed by 14%.
Extends the duration of Energy Blackhole to 5.0 sec. Increases the suction range by 6.0 meters.
Deals an additional 371 fire damage every time the Attack button is tapped (up to 15 times) when Ultimate is active.
Combo attacks deal an additional 296 physical damage to the primary target.

S.rank-desc-gw:
Energy Blackhole enhanced at S rank: duration increased to 5 seconds, suction range increased to 6m. As the blackhole is drastically improved, S rank is highly recommended.
No need to farm beyond S rank if using her as support.

loadouts-premium.desc-g8: Cleopatra raises damage dealt to stunned shield broken enemies, therefore is compatible with VR Kiana. In addition, Hyper Railguns can cause paralysis with weapons skills, making Cleopatra's skills more useful.

loadouts-premium.desc-gw: VR Kiana deals high damage to shields, and the enemies can be stunned by various means when the shield is destroyed. Impair enemies with Mjolnir to quickly destroy the shield and aim to maintain damage increase during stun. VR Kiana is equipped Lier Scarlet stigmata for durability as she plays a supportive role rather than an offensive one. Thanks to the 2 Set Bonus, she can endure long battles in the abyss.

Set focused on durability.  Reduce damage taken with 2 Set Bonus of Lier Scarlet and recover HP by dealing critical damage with Kepler (B). Recommended for challenging Abyss etc. where durability has priority.
loadouts-premium.desc-g8: A set where Lier (T) enhances damage while Lier (M) and Kepler recovers HP. Since the 2 set bonus from Lier can reduce damage, this set is recommended for stages with where attacks are intense.

loadouts-premium.desc-gw:
Recommended set for Dimension Breaker Bronya and Goushinnso Memento Sakura team composition.
By shortening the weapon skill cooldown with Siegfried (M), a chain attack of Energy Blackhole (VR Kiana) → Water Spirit Type-II weapon skill → Switch skill (DB Bronya) → Combo Skill (Meme Sakura) becomes possible.
Attacking the same enemy increases CRT and CDMG. Also, the smaller the number of enemies. the better the set performs. A set suited for fighting bosses.

loadouts-discount.desc-gw: A balanced set that balances firepower and durability. Theresa - Origins(M) shortens weapon skill cooldowns and is recommended for QTE support. Choose weapons according to QTE conditions.

loadouts-discount.desc-g8:
A set that strengthens damage done to stunned enemies using Nikola Tesla and ranged physical damage using the 2 Set Bonus of Wang Zhaojun. Wang Zhaojun can raise max HP and DEF so both offensive power and defensive power are improved.
Artemis' Guardian contributes to VR Kiana's supportive role by inflicting Time Lock.

team-synergy.desc-gw: VR Kiana can trigger her QTE by stunning. SD Mei benefits from VR Kiana's leader skill.
By stunning enemies, VC Bronya's QTE can be triggered. As VC Bronya's QTE is very powerful, teaming up only to trigger her QTE is good enough.

team-synergy.desc-g8: Meme Sakura can deal tremendous amounts of damage thanks to paralysis and frozen statuses inflicted by weapon skills from VR Kiana.
DB Bronya, together with VC Kiana, makes it easier to activate Meme Sakura's passive.

strengths.title: HP recovery specialist!
strengths.text-gw: Due to the numerous ways of recovering HP, team stability is greatly improved. This is especially true in the Infinite Abyss where HP is slowly lost.

strengths.title: Inflicts various status effects
strengths.text-gw: DP Kiana alone can inflict various status effects, which can trigger QTE of other valkyries. Equipping a weapon that can inflict other status effects further improves her coverage.

strengths.title: Prevents teammates from dying
strengths.text-gw: At SSS Rank, DP Kiana's passive allows her to switch out a dying team member and recovery HP once. While the road to SSS Rank is long, it is worthwhile for learning the passive skill.

strengths.title: Synergetic with many other valkyries in co-op
strengths.text-gw:
Great compatibility with Knight Moonbeam Kiana's team skill that can greatly increases CRT and CDMG during Time Fracture since DP Kiana can maintain Time Fracture for a long time.
In addition, with the team skill of Valkyrie Chariot Bronya, the SP of the valkyrie that is within range will recover continuously. Together, DP Kiana can channel her ultimate for a longer time.

strengths.title: Contributes without being on the field
strengths.text-gw: While not on field, it is possible to lower enemy's DEF by up to 80% while dealing lightning damage to enemies every 10 seconds by passive skill effect. That one can contribute to the team's damage while waiting for one's turn is appealing.

weaknesses.title: Strong in one-on-one battles, but lacking in burst damage
weaknesses.text-gw: Inflicting Time Lock via Ultimate Evasion and Time Fracture via Ultimate skill can restrain enemies for a long time. DP Kiana can shave the enemy's HP while keeping herself safe, but her burst damage is not high.

skills.skill-desc: Increases whole team's Movement Speed by 25% and Mecha Characters' Attack Speed by 14%.
Extends the duration of Energy Blackhole to 5.0 sec. Increases the suction range by 6.0 meters.

S.rank-desc-gw: At the S rank, it becomes possible to activate Ultimate Evasion twice consecutively, alongside with a cooldown decrease. Since it becomes easier to inflict Time Fracture, S rank is a priority.

SS.rank-desc-gw:
A portion of HP can be recovered instantaneously on the activation of the Ultimate skill. Even if the Ultimate skill is activated with less SP, having a guarenteed amount of HP recovered is valuable.
While channeling the Ultimate skill, all team members have increased movement speed and attack speed. It is recommended to battle by switching to Bronya etc., where the benefit of increasing the attack speed is large because DP Kiana's Ultimate persists even if other valkyries are switched in.

SSS.rank-desc-gw: Although it is only once each quest, DP Kiana can recover HP and prevent death of members. While it is not essential, it doesn't hurt to have it in one's arsenal of skills, so one can obtain it with getting DP Kiana to SSS Rank being the main aim.

loadouts-premium.desc-gw:
Black Jixuanyuan 2 Set Bonus and Schrodinger Band speeds up SP acquisition to activate the Ultimate skill, triggering HP recovery and inflicting Time Fracture. If the 2nd Sacred Relic is equipped, the SP acquisition rate is further increased.
The increased duration of Time Fracture from the Ultimate and the Black Jixuanyuan's skill that increases damage during Time Fracture works very well together.

Zhuge Kongming reduces cooldown of Ultimate Evasion, making it easier to land a Time Lock on the enemy. In addition, DP Kiana, whose Ultimate skill creates a long-lasting Time Fracture, is highly compatible with Black Jixuanyuan.
One may raise the SP acquisition rate with 2nd Sacred Relic, or increase CRT with Mjolnir, or improve support capabilities with Judgement of Shamash. It is recommended to have a wide range of weapon choices.

With Thunder Kikaku and Issac Newton, damage dealt to enemies by Shadow Knight Fuka and Oath of Judah is improved. While the stages where this set shines are somewhat limited, it is recommended for score-based stages such as Memorial Arena.

A set with emphasis on inflicting Time Lock.
Cooldown of Ultimate Evasion is greatly reduced with Zhuge Kongming and Shakespeare/Fuxi 2 Set Bonus, and Artemis' Guardian can inflict Time Lock through its weapon skill.

loadouts-premium.desc-g8: A set consisting of Dark Jixuanyuan, who increases damage dealt, movement speed and attack speed during Time Fracture, and Lier Scarlet, who recovers HP. The ease of activating Time Fracture via her Ultimate skill is what makes DP Kiana highly compatible with this set.

A set specialized in endurance, where Zhuge Kongming shortens the cooldown of Ultimate Evasion and increases DEF, while Kallen - Hymn generates a Grace Shield. This combination is recommended for scenarios where DP Kiana mainly supports allies with HP recovery and Time Lock.
The 3rd Sacred Relic can hasten the activation of DP Kiana's Ultimate skill.

loadouts-discount.desc-gw: As DP Kiana's Combo Skill has high CRT, it is easy to activate Rinaldo's skills. Besides enhancing both firepower and durability, it is also possible to paralyze enemies. It is recommended to equip a weapon that inflicts status effects to activate allies' QTE.

Rowland's skills imparts a sense of stability with HP recovery, status effect nullification, and DEF increase. On the offensive side, the damage dealt by Combo Skill is strengthened with Water Spirit Type-I, and CRT is increased by Rowland's 3 Set Bonus.

When Artemis' Guardian, a weapon that floats enemies and inflicts Time Lock, is equipped on DP Kiana, who can also inflict Time Lock through Ultimate Evasion, the enemies' movements are severely restricted.
Elizabeth Bathory's skills rely on maintaining high HP, therefore she has good compatibility with DP Kiana who has HP recovery skills.

team-synergy.desc-g8: DB Bronya can inflict Time Lock on enemies with her Switch skill, so together with DP Kiana, the movements of enemies are severely restricted.
Since Blood Rose Himeko consumes HP during her powerful Ultimate skill, she is compatible with HP recovery specialst DP Kiana.
